EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Virtual User Group Beta_2018.Reminder Email Apr 1 PCF User Grou
EmailTemplate.subject: April 1st PCF User Group Event Reminder and Room Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you again for registering for our In-Person PCF User Group at Cloud Foundry Summit <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/pcf-user-group-april-2019.html?utm_campaign=global_event_pcf_virtual_user_group_apr1_q219&utm_source=&utm_medium=email]]>, in Philadelphia. Weâ€™re looking forward to seeing on Monday, April 1 from 1-5 p.m. for our in-person meeting and then for cocktails and socializing from 5-6:30 p.m.
The meeting location will be in room 125 at the Pennsylvania Convention Center. See the convention center map <[[https://www.discoverphl.com/meet/floorplans/level/100/1]]> for directions.
If you have any questions please reach out to Madison Schlegel at mschlegel@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mschlegel@pivotal.io]]>.
Looking forward to seeing you all soon!
Your host, John Allwright
